name: Butt-Ugly Martians: Zoom or Doom!
overview: Race the fastest, most futuristic vehicles in the universe to the ultimate finish line! Emperor Bog is fed up with the Butt-Ugly Martians' antics. To continue their assignment on earth, the Butt-Uglies must win the Martian Conqueror's Cup - a heart-pounding, interstellar racing championship among 9 different tracks, plus hidden tracks and bonuses! Special automatic mode eases handling!
